paper.title: Weighted Matching in the Semi-Streaming Model

author.org: Goethe-Universität, Institut für Informatik, 60054, Frankfurt am Main, Germany#TAB#

paper.abstract: We present an approximation algorithm to find a weighted matching of a graph in the one-pass semi-streaming model. The semi-streaming model forbids random access to the input graph and restricts the memory to ${\mathcal{O}}(n\cdot\operatorname{polylog}n)$ bits where n denotes the number of the vertices of the input graph. We obtain an approximation ratio of 5.58 while the previously best algorithm achieves a ratio of 5.82.
